author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
GENERAL

Codissia – SIDBI Industrial Services: Counselling and Guidance to entrepreneurs, Conference Hall, Huzur Road, 3 p.m.

British Deputy High Commission: Glocalising Innovation – UK Alumni Meet, Hotel Taj Vivanta, 5 p.m.

Kumaraguru College of Technology: 9th conference on Advances in Mechanical Sciences – AIMS 2016, 9.30 a.m.

Rathinam Technical Campus: 2nd IEEE conference on Engineering and Technology, 10 a.m.

EASA College of Engineering and Technology: 8th annual day celebrations, 11 a.m.

SNS College of Engineering: Workshop on India’s Biggest Bridge, 10 a.m.

Sundharesan and Co: Inauguration of Bank of Baroda’s banking service centre, 189 East Bashyakarlu Road, in front of Maruthi theatre, 12.30 p.m.

KTVR Knowledge Park: Talent Hunt, 9.30 a.m.

AGRITECH 2016: Agriculture exhibition, Suguna Kalyana Mandapam, 10.30 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Workshop on Balance Sheet Analysis, Mahatma Gandhi Hall, 10 a.m.

Ranganathan Engineering College: Conference on Concrete Vision for Humanity, 9 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Rewop 16 – technical symposium, 9.30 a.m.

Sardar Vallabhai Patel International School of Textiles and Management: Inter-collegiate competition, Giza 16, 9 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology: Lecture workshop on Cryptography and Cyber security, 9 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
